attributes.action: Petition UK airports to install and upgrade smoking areas
attributes.additional_details:
Airports all over UK are removing smoking areas inside the airport, only allowing outdoor designated areas at front of departure areas.
The government should step in and legislate for smoking areas to be available in all UK airports for smokers, nervous flyers and e cigarette smokers
attributes.background: Petition belfast international airport to reinstall and upgrade smoking area. And all UK airports to install improve and upgrade smoking areas to include sand boxes for butt's and chairs, tables, bar and flight information

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about smoking facilities in airports are a matter for individual airports, not the UK Government or Parliament.
